game.name: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 2
game.description:
The lovely winter season has just come and all cute animals look excited to wear the warm outfits. These two little and cute Ponies are no different from others, so they also have decided to get the more fashionable looks. Would you help them to carry the unique winter outlooks? Join My Little Pony Winter Fashion 2 game and be prepared to guide Twilight Sparkle and Applejack to pick up the awesome outfits for winter!

Select the first pony and start dressing her up with the outfits you see on the screen in this brand new princess game for girls! Give your ponies a new fabulous look with some cool warm dresses, a new tail and change her mane as well! These two ponies have planned for a trip into the most awaiting frozen land. Be careful at the details and follow all the hints to complete your goal successfully! Make sure to adapt to the winter trend to make them look fabulous. 

These are five items to choose from, including hairstyles, scarves, tops, hats, and a pair of warm shoes. Try to put your best fashion abilities to make both of them satisfied with their new and amazing dresses! Mix and match as many choices as you can until you crate the satisfactory looks for both of them in this one of the best dress-up games for kids! It will be your responsibility now to make them look beautiful. They will feel proud on you. Have a fun blast in our online games, no download required on atmegame.com!
